definition: to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
Look out for yourself, or heaven and earth will combine to destroy you./Every man for himself, and the Devil take the hindmost.
pinyin: ren2 bu4 wei4 ji3 , tian1 zhu1 di4 mie4

sentences.english: Everyone for himself and the devil take the hindmost—this is the bourgeois point of view on life.
sentences.chinese: “人不为己，天诛地灭”，这是资产阶级的人生观。

sentences.english: Every man for himself, and the devil takes the hindmost .
sentences.chinese: 本来是想到人不为己，天诛地灭的，但又觉得不太对。

definition: Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
lit. nest of devils/place occupied by sinister forces
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
